body_html:
Sorry, I cannot approve this PR.

SavingListener part looks good. But ValidationMonitor is known not working well in distributed model. So, we cannot support that.

The workaround for user, who needs this feature, is to define the monitors.ValidationMonitor in user code and pass to Experiment constructor (train_monitors arg).
body_text:
Sorry, I cannot approve this PR.
SavingListener part looks good. But ValidationMonitor is known not working well in distributed model. So, we cannot support that.
The workaround for user, who needs this feature, is to define the monitors.ValidationMonitor in user code and pass to Experiment constructor (train_monitors arg).
body:
Sorry, I cannot approve this PR. 

SavingListener part looks good. But ValidationMonitor is known not working well in distributed model. So, we cannot support that. 

The workaround for user, who needs this feature, is to define the monitors.ValidationMonitor in user code and pass to Experiment constructor (train_monitors arg).
